TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple ClientSideProviderFactoryCallback(IntPtr hwnd, int idChild, int idObject);
.class public auto ansi sealed ClientSideProviderFactoryCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The window for which the provider is created.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that creates a client-side UI Automation provider for a window.
Docs.returns: Represents the method that creates a client-side UI Automation provider for a window.

remarks.format: ## Examples For example code, see [Create a Client-Side UI Automation Provider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
